name: Jet Random Groups Widget
author: Jettochkin

sections.description:
en: Create a cloud groups your social network! You have a lot of communities? Want to show users a maximum of groups? Install this widget!
Provides random groups avatar with link to group

ru: Создайте облако групп Вашей социальной сети! У Вас множество групп? Хотите показать пользователям максимум групп? Установить этот виджет!

live demo (need registration)

! backward compatibility with 1.1.3

Contact

For suggestions, bugs, hugs and love can be donated at the following locations.

Authors page

Plugin page
sections.installation:
1. Upload j-rnd-groups.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add widget to site
sections.changelog:
1.3

Update readme note!

1.2.5

  • Add BP 1.2.5 compatibility

1.2

  • Tested compatibility with WordPress 3.0

1.1.1

  • Add BP 1.2.4.1 compatibility

1.0

  • Ability to provide a link to the group header
  • Correction code and localization

0.3

  • compatibility with 1.1.3 and 1.2

0.2.1

  • Change descriptions and links

0.2

  • Add button-link to the groups list

0.1

  • First Release.
